DOC.detailed_description: Investigators study 100 pediatric surgical patient admit Sulaimani Teaching Hospital Otorhinolaryngology , Head Neck Surgical Department , first June 2011 first September 2011 , Children age 2-7 year , gender , ASA physical status Ð† II ( ASA I : healthy normal patient , ASA II : patient mild systemic disease functional limitation ) schedule elective adenotonsillectomy operation . They randomly divide two equal group accord induction method . Group 1 ( G1 ) use incremental induction sevoflurane ( 1-8 % ) 100 % O2 , vapor concentration increase 1 % every breath . Group 2 ( G2 ) high concentration sevoflurane ( 8 % ) 100 % O2 begin induction . None give premedication adjunct drug successful intubation do ; ventilation assist controlled possible . If upper airway obstruction occur , oropharyngeal airway immediately insert . Attempts make obtain venous access laryngoscopy . All patient monitor electrocardiography ( ECG ) , noninvasive blood pressure monitoring ( NIBP ) , pulse oximetry , temperature measurement . Children extreme weight , suspicion difficult airway , move laryngoscopy , one trial laryngoscopy need exclude study . The endotracheal tube ( ETT ) size select use formula ( age/4 ) + 4.5 . Only single laryngoscopy attempt allow . Small , brief movement extremity occur ( ETT ) placement consider exclusion criterion . Anesthesia deliver anesthetic machine ( Datex Ohmeda ) , use Ayer 's T-piece Jackson Ree 's modification system , fresh gas flow 6 L/min Sevoflurane vaporizer . Patients observe eyelash reflex disappears , pupil center constrict . Jaw relaxation movement monitor . Ventilation control till time laryngoscopy ; vocal cord completely visible , orotracheal intubation do Macintosh laryngoscope blade size 2 anesthetist patient . The time induction successful tracheal intubation record .
